explains: n. 晕头转向，[临床] 眩晕
wordGroup: cervical vertigo 颈性眩晕，颈椎性眩晕

sentences.cn: 良性阵发性位置性眩晕(BPPV)。

sentences.en: They could also have enlarged lymph nodes, lethargy and vertigo.
sentences.cn: 他们还可能有淋巴结肿大，嗜睡和眩晕等症状。

sentences.en: A fear of heights, the medical word used for this is vertigo.
sentences.cn: 恐高，医学术语称之为眩晕。
